response.overview: This fantasy unfolds in a fantastical world, centered around a woman who becomes pregnant with a rabbit. As a child, Asako dreamed of becoming a dancer. When she was young, her father told her, "If you go to Eugenetia in times of trouble, the rabbits flying in the night sky will protect you," before disappearing. As an adult, Asako is told by her obstetrician that she is pregnant with a rabbit. Troubled, Asako falls into a deep sleep, remembering the story of the rabbits of Eugenetia that her father told her, as she holds a stuffed rabbit left behind by her father. (MTL of eigacom overview)
response.title: Flying Rabbit in the Night Sky
